verses.verse: כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki When נַ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> Na-'ar [was] a child יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El When Israel וָאֹהֲבֵ֑הוּ <S%H157><s%> va-'o-ha-Ve-hu; then I loved וּמִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> u-mi-mitz-Ra-yim out of Egypt קָרָ֥אתִי <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra-ti him and called לִבְנִֽי׃ <S%H1121><s%> liv-Ni. my son

קָרְא֖וּ <S%H7121><s%> ka-re-'U [As] they called לָהֶ֑ם la-Hem; כֵּ֚ן <S%H3651><s%> ken the more הָלְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> ha-le-Chu them so they went מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-nei-Hem, from them לַבְּעָלִ֣ים <S%H1168><s%> lab-be-'a-Lim unto Baalim יְזַבֵּ֔חוּ <S%H2076><s%> ye-zab-Be-chu, they sacrificed וְלַפְּסִלִ֖ים <S%H6456><s%> ve-lap-pe-si-Lim to graven images יְקַטֵּרֽוּן׃ <S%H6999><s%> ye-kat-te-Run. and burned incense

וְאָנֹכִ֤י <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi is I תִרְגַּ֙לְתִּי֙ <S%H7270><s%> tir-Gal-ti taught לְאֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> le-'ef-Ra-yim, Ephraim קָחָ֖ם <S%H3947><s%> ka-Cham taking עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in זְרֽוֹעֹתָ֑יו <S%H2220><s%> ze-ro-'o-Tav; them by their arms וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not יָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'U but they knew כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for רְפָאתִֽים׃ <S%H7495><s%> re-fa-Tim. not that I healed

בְּחַבְלֵ֨י <S%H2256><s%> be-chav-Lei them with cords אָדָ֤ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of a man אֶמְשְׁכֵם֙ <S%H4900><s%> 'em-she-Chem I drew בַּעֲבֹת֣וֹת <S%H5688><s%> ba-'a-vo-Tot with bands אַהֲבָ֔ה <S%H160><s%> 'a-ha-Vah, of love וָאֶהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> va-'eh-Yeh became לָהֶ֛ם la-Hem כִּמְרִ֥ימֵי <S%H7311><s%> kim-Ri-mei and I was to them as they that take off עֹ֖ל <S%H5923><s%> 'ol the yoke עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al from לְחֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H3895><s%> le-chei-Hem; on their jaws וְאַ֥ט <S%H328><s%> ve-'At secret אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to אוֹכִֽיל׃ <S%H398><s%> o-Chil. meat

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo They will not יָשׁוּב֙ <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shuv He shall not return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz into the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt וְאַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> ve-'ash-Shur but the Assyrian ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he מַלְכּ֑וֹ <S%H4428><s%> mal-Ko; shall be his king כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because מֵאֲנ֖וּ <S%H3985><s%> me-'a-Nu because they refused לָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> la-Shuv. to return

וְחָלָ֥ה <S%H2342><s%> ve-cha-Lah shall abide חֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> che-rev And the sword בְּעָרָ֔יו <S%H5892><s%> be-'a-Rav, on his cities וְכִלְּתָ֥ה <S%H3615><s%> ve-chil-le-Tah and shall consume בַדָּ֖יו <S%H905><s%> vad-Dav his branches וְאָכָ֑לָה <S%H398><s%> ve-'a-Cha-lah; and devour מִֽמֹּעֲצ֖וֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4156><s%> mi-mo-'a-Tzo-tei-Hem. [them] because of their own counsels

וְעַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> ve-'am-Mi And my people תְלוּאִ֖ים <S%H8511><s%> te-lu-'Im are bent לִמְשֽׁוּבָתִ֑י <S%H4878><s%> lim-shu-va-Ti; to backsliding וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- about עַל֙ <S%H5920><s%> 'al them to the most High יִקְרָאֻ֔הוּ <S%H7121><s%> yik-ra-'U-hu, from me though they called יַ֖חַד <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad none at all לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo None יְרוֹמֵם׃ <S%H7311><s%> ye-ro-mem would exalt

אֵ֞יךְ <S%H349><s%> 'eich How אֶתֶּנְךָ֣ <S%H5414><s%> 'et-ten-Cha How shall I give thee up אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim, Ephraim אֲמַגֶּנְךָ֙ <S%H4042><s%> 'a-mag-gen-Cha deliver יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel אֵ֚יךְ <S%H349><s%> 'eich How אֶתֶּנְךָ֣ <S%H5414><s%> 'et-ten-Cha make כְאַדְמָ֔ה <S%H126><s%> che-'ad-Mah, Admah אֲשִֽׂימְךָ֖ <S%H7760><s%> 'a-si-me-Cha appoint כִּצְבֹאיִ֑ם <S%H6636><s%> kitz-vo-Yim; Zeboiim נֶהְפַּ֤ךְ <S%H2015><s%> neh-Pach is turned עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai within לִבִּ֔י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi, care for יַ֖חַד <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad together נִכְמְר֥וּ <S%H3648><s%> nich-me-Ru are kindled נִחוּמָֽי׃ <S%H5150><s%> ni-chu-Mai. within me my repentings

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo I will not אֶֽעֱשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-Seh I will not execute חֲר֣וֹן <S%H2740><s%> cha-Ron the fierceness אַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pi, of mine anger לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not אָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> 'a-Shuv I will not return לְשַׁחֵ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> le-sha-Chet to destroy אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim; Ephraim כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki For אֵ֤ל <S%H410><s%> 'el for I [am] God אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not אִ֔ישׁ <S%H582><s%> 'Ish, in בְּקִרְבְּךָ֣ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-be-Cha in the midst קָד֔וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Doosh, the Holy One וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and I will not אָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> a-Vo of thee and I will not enter בְּעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> be-'Ir. into the city

אַחֲרֵ֧י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD יֵלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> ye-le-Chu will walk כְּאַרְיֵ֣ה <S%H738><s%> ke-'ar-Yeh like a lion יִשְׁאָ֑ג <S%H7580><s%> yish-'Ag; he shall roar כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Indeed ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He יִשְׁאַ֔ג <S%H7580><s%> yish-'Ag, when he shall roar וְיֶחֶרְד֥וּ <S%H2729><s%> ve-ye-cher-Du shall tremble בָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim then the children מִיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> mi-Yam. from the west

יֶחֶרְד֤וּ <S%H2729><s%> ye-cher-Du They shall tremble כְצִפּוֹר֙ <S%H6833><s%> che-tzip-pOr as a bird מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, out of Egypt וּכְיוֹנָ֖ה <S%H3123><s%> u-che-yo-Nah and as a dove מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land אַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur; of Assyria וְהוֹשַׁבְתִּ֥ים <S%H3427><s%> ve-ho-shav-Tim and I will place עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in בָּתֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H1004><s%> bat-tei-Hem them in their houses נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek

סְבָבֻ֤נִי <S%H5437><s%> se-va-Vu-ni compasseth בְכַ֙חַשׁ֙ <S%H3585><s%> ve-Cha-chash me about with lies אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim, Ephraim וּבְמִרְמָ֖ה <S%H4820><s%> u-ve-mir-Mah with deceit בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit and the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> vi-hu-Dah, but Judah עֹ֥ד <S%H5750><s%> 'od is also רָד֙ <S%H7300><s%> rad yet ruleth עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- against אֵ֔ל <S%H410><s%> 'El, with God וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im- against קְדוֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H6918><s%> ke-do-Shim with the saints נֶאֱמָֽן׃ <S%H539><s%> ne-'e-Man. and is faithful
